name: conductor
description: Context-Driven Development for Qwen Code - A structured approach to software development that treats context as a managed artifact
author: Qwen Community

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Initialize project context with foundational documents

commands.name: newTrack
commands.description: Create a new track (high-level unit of work) with specification and plan

commands.name: implement
commands.description: Execute planned tasks following defined workflows

commands.name: status
commands.description: Get status overview of current tracks and progress

commands.name: revert
commands.description: Revert changes for a logical work unit
